name: Ma Che Vuoi
description:
Build the tower of Pisa ! The more it leans, the more tourists it will attract... But don't let it fall !
----------

SPACE : Drop Block

----------

The game was made at Global Game Jam Antwerp 2020. We overscoped it a bit, so not everything you can see in the screenshots is actually in the game....

----------

A game by :

Henri Couvreur (code)

Noël-Tiên Nguyên-Thê (art)

Chayenne Gonçalves Rangel (writing)

Stan Lee Cole (music)

Lander De Wandel (art)
